browser extension

(work in progress)

The Conzept browser extension is a (lightly-patched) fork of the great Wikidata-for-Web extension.

This extension allows you to:

  • Text-selection search: Select some text on any website, then right-click for the context-menu , which will show an option to search on Conzept. Even browser-viewed PDF files are supported!
  • Detect and see the semantic metadata on (supported) websites, in a sidebar panel. This works through Wikidata-based URL-matching and by checking the website for embedded metadata (meta-tags, JSON-LD).
